Description: Define and communicate the organizationâ€™s risk management strategy.
Assign and communicate cybersecurity roles and responsibilities.
Physical and software assets are inventoried.
Policies, processes, and procedures are established and communicated.
Identities and credentials are managed for authorized devices and users.
Anomalous activity is detected and analyzed.
The network is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events.
Response processes are executed during and after an incident.
Activities are performed to prevent expansion of an event and to resolve the incident.
Recovery processes are executed and maintained to restore systems or assets.
Public relations and reputation are managed during and after an incident.
